metadata.title: Mechanism-First Causal Graphs for Noncoding GWAS: Code and Data
metadata.description:
This repository contains the code, configuration, and reproducibility artifacts for the paper 'Mechanism-First Causal Graphs for Noncoding GWAS: A Calibrated Atlas Linking Variants → Regulatory Elements → Genes → Tissues → Traits'. The framework implements probabilistic mechanism graphs with path-probability inference, calibrated against three-tier benchmarks and validated through cross-study replication.

Key features:
- SuSiE-based fine-mapping with multi-signal support
- coloc.susie colocalization for multi-tissue eQTL integration
- ABC (Activity-by-Contact) and PCHi-C enhancer-gene linking
- Noisy-OR probabilistic inference model
- Per-module probability calibration
- eQTL Catalogue cross-study replication
- Three-tier benchmark system with anti-leakage provisions
